body: Gnomes experiment with all manner of mechanical devices. Gnomes with this racial trait gain a +1 bonus on Disable Device and Knowledge (engineering) checks. They are treated as proficient with any weapon they have personally crafted. This racial trait replaces the defensive training and hatred racial traits.
name: Master Tinker
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Gnomes/Alternate Racial Traits/Master Tinker
